product_details.name: Luxe Pearl & Gold Wave Hoop Earrings - Timeless Elegance Collection
product_details.description:
• Premium 18K gold-plated finish for lasting brilliance
• Double-row genuine pearl embellishments
• Sophisticated wave design for modern glamour
• Secure post-back closure system
• Perfect size for both day and evening wear
• Hypoallergenic materials suitable for sensitive ears
• Elegant curved silhouette with contemporary appeal
• Versatile design pairs with both casual and formal attire
• Handcrafted with attention to detail
• Comes in a luxury gift box perfect for special occasions

banner_details:
This banner highlights a luxurious jewelry product set against a deep plum background with elegant gold wave accents on the top and bottom. The composition centers around a classy product image ("product_image") framed by concentric golden circles ("decorative_circle") for emphasis. The main highlight is a large headline text ("heading") in a stylized serif font, followed by a sophisticated subtitle ("subheading"), and a promotional tagline ("tagline") just below. A circular gold badge contains the price ("price"), drawing attention immediately. Informative feature points are provided in a sleek text strip ("description") at the bottom. A strong call-to-action button ("cta") rests centrally over a gold rectangle ("cta_background") encouraging a purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: #2D1A30
- Gold: #D4AF37, #E3C064
- Pearl White: #FFF8E7
- Light Cream: #E3D5C0
- Text Accent Black: #2D1A30
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a dominant gold and pearl-white color palette. The radiant **metallic gold** (#D4AF37) forms the base, exuding opulence and warmth, while the **pearl white** (#F8F8FF) beaded accents add sophistication. The design utilizes **high-contrast blending**, where the shimmering gold curves highlight the reflective nature of the material, and the delicate pearl lines stand out due to their matte finish. The reflective surface of the earrings further enhances depth by casting subtle shades of **warm beige** (#E5C97A) and **soft highlights** (#FFFCEE). This combination captures luxury while maintaining a clean, modern appeal.
